abstract: Google is offering software to link video on your computer and on YouTube with the PlayStation 3 and other devices that hook up to televisions. It’s not clear how much of a commitment Google has to this market, but it is trying a lot of ways to get YouTube into the living room.
snippet: Google is offering software to link video on your computer and on YouTube with the PlayStation 3 and other devices that hook up to televisions. It’s not clear how much of a commitment Google has to this market, but it is trying a lot of ways to ge...
lead_paragraph: Google has entered the living room, but it’s not clear whether it is just wandering through or whether it will grab some popcorn, plop on the couch and stay for a while.

headline.main: Google Plays With Your Living Room TV
